room_001.name: Village Square
room_001.description: The heart of the starting village. A large stone fountain sits in the center, surrounded by cobblestone paths. Shops and homes line the square, and villagers go about their daily business. The air is filled with the sounds of merchants calling out their wares and children playing.
room_001.short_description: A bustling village square with a central fountain.

room_002.name: Village Inn
room_002.description: A cozy inn with a warm fireplace and comfortable chairs. The smell of hearty stew and fresh bread fills the air. Travelers and locals alike gather here to share stories and rest.

room_003.name: Blacksmith's Shop
room_003.description: The village blacksmith's workshop. The sound of hammer on anvil rings out, and the heat from the forge fills the room. Tools and weapons line the walls, and the smell of hot metal and coal is strong.

room_004.name: Village Gate
room_004.description: The main entrance to the village. A sturdy wooden gate stands open, welcoming travelers. Beyond the gate, a dirt road leads into the surrounding countryside.

room_005.name: Village Library
room_005.description: A quiet library filled with ancient tomes and scrolls. Dust motes dance in the sunlight streaming through tall windows. The air is thick with the smell of old parchment and ink.
room_005.short_description: A peaceful library with many books.

room_006.name: Inn Bedroom
room_006.description: A simple but comfortable bedroom in the inn. A soft bed with clean linens sits against one wall, and a small window looks out over the village square.
room_006.short_description: A comfortable bedroom in the inn.

room_007.name: Blacksmith's Storage
room_007.description: A storage room behind the blacksmith's shop. Raw materials, finished goods, and tools are organized on shelves and in barrels.
room_007.short_description: A storage room filled with materials and tools.

room_008.name: Forest Path
room_008.description: A narrow dirt path leading into the Whispering Woods. The trees grow tall and close together, their branches intertwining overhead. The sound of rustling leaves and distant bird calls fills the air.
room_008.short_description: A path leading into the forest.

room_009.name: Library Basement
room_009.description: A dusty basement beneath the library. Old books and scrolls are stored here, along with various magical components and alchemical supplies.
room_009.short_description: A dusty basement with old books and supplies.

room_010.name: Forest Clearing
room_010.description: A small clearing in the forest where sunlight breaks through the canopy. Wildflowers grow in patches, and a small stream bubbles nearby.
room_010.short_description: A peaceful clearing in the forest.
